name: Lose a Letter Lexicon Ladder Pt 15 Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here's a playing tip - If you can't solve the first clue go to one of the others that you can solve, and then work up and down from there.
First word of six letters -

Shelter for domesticated swine

Now drop one letter from the previous answer and rearrange the remaining letters to make the new word of five letters-

Intoxicated

Third word of four letters -

Sympathy for another

Fourth word of three letters -

pinnacle of iceberg

Fifth word of two letters -

Small private investigator

A new word of six letters -

Moving

Second word of five letters -

West Indian dance while passing under a bar

Third word of four letters -

An abscess or pimple

Fourth word of three letters -

Hit, or throw, a ball in a high arc

Fifth word of two letters -

Outside broadcast cut short
